casebody.data:
LAMAR OCI SOUTH
v.
STANLY COUNTY, et al. No. 485A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Robert C. Stephens, Mark R. Kutny, Charlotte, Joshua J. Morton, Jr., for Stanly County, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of April 2008 by Petitioner to Amend Petitioner Appellant's New Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
